data.name: Rocket of Whispers: Prologue Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This soundtrack contains music from Rocket of Whispers: Prologue that reflects the witch’s first moments in the apocalyptic world.



It features 10 masterfully composed tracks by lead composer Triodust and SIGONO sound designer Hsu, Chi-Wei, including several unused tracks. Some tracks are arranged from classic OPUS: Rocket of Whispers tunes, beautifully written to bring players back to where it all began.

The music mainly features the piano and string instruments, creating multiple layers of auditory pleasure. It also invokes an heart-tugging feeling of loneliness that settles down into soothing calm.

Let the rhythm of emotions transport you into the story and game, and let the musical progression give you the courage to march forward in spite of the apocalypse.

Track list


1. Prologue
2. Recollect
3. Cryonic
4. Return (How Long Must I Wait)
5. The World You Promised (My Fault)
6. Fei Lin - Beginning of a Journey
7. Wake (Bonus Track)
8. Lost (Bonus Track)
9. Distant Song (Bonus Track)
10. Cryonic II (Bonus Track)
11. Continue Story (Bonus Track)
12. Fei Lin - Beginning of a Journey Demo Version (Bonus Track)

NOTE:
  • All songs are available in WAV format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 10
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Dual Core or Greater
  • Graphics: 256 MB OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Snow Leopard or later
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Dual Core or Greater
  • Graphics: 256 MB OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card
